title: Debenhams Group brands expand across US marketplaces - Retail Gazette
summary:
- Debenhams Group is launching its British fashion brands, including Coast, Warehouse, Oasis, Nasty Gal, and Karen Millen, on major US online marketplaces such as Macy’s, Bloomingdale’s, and Nordstrom.
- This expansion is part of Debenhams' international growth strategy, leveraging the strong demand for British fashion in the US market.
- The partnership with technology platform Refined Networks facilitates the entry of over 30 British retailers into the US this year, enhancing market reach.
- The collaboration with iconic department stores provides access to a customer base of over 350 million shoppers monthly, significantly increasing visibility for Debenhams' brands.
- Despite this expansion, Debenhams reported widening pre-tax losses of £264 million for the year ending February 2025, indicating ongoing financial challenges while pursuing growth opportunities.
